responses: PixelCode is a developer-focused learning platform built by Kundan. It offers the Striver DSA Sheet with an integrated code editor to practice, run, and submit code seamlessly. It also features top-quality tutorials in DSA, DBMS, OS, CN, and more.

patterns: Who is the creator of PixelCode?
responses: PixelCode is developed by Kundan Kumar, a passionate developer dedicated to helping students master technical subjects effectively.

patterns: What can I learn on PixelCode?
responses: PixelCode offers educational content focused on core Computer Science subjects such as Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), DBMS, Operating Systems, Computer Networks, and more.

patterns: Is the Striver DSA sheet available?
Can I practice Striver's DSA sheet here?
responses: Yes! PixelCode features the complete Striver DSA Sheet along with a built-in code editor where you can write, run, and submit your solutions.

patterns: Is there a code editor on this site?
Can I code directly on PixelCode?
responses: Absolutely! PixelCode includes a powerful in-browser code editor that supports multiple languages, allowing you to run and submit code efficiently.

patterns: Do I need to pay to use PixelCode?
responses: Yes, PixelCode is completely free to use. Just sign up and start learning!

patterns: How can I create an account on PixelCode?
responses: To register, visit the Sign Up page, enter your details, and you're ready to go!

patterns: Does this site save my submissions?
responses: Yes, PixelCode keeps track of your progress and submissions, helping you stay on top of your preparation.
PixelCode stands out for its smooth code editor, real-time submission tracking, curated content like Striver's DSA sheet, and rich tutorials crafted to simplify complex technical topics.

patterns: Can I learn DBMS or OS here?
responses: Yes! PixelCode offers easy-to-follow tutorials on DSA, DBMS, OS, CN, and other computer science core subjects.

patterns: Can I upload questions or tutorials?
responses: Currently, content contribution is limited, but stay tuned! We plan to open community contributions soon.

patterns: How do I reset my password?
responses: To reset your password, visit the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions to reset it.
You can contact us anytime at support@pixelcode.com. Weâ€™re happy to help!

patterns: Can I use this on my phone?
responses: Yes, PixelCode is mobile-friendly. A mobile app is also under development!
